7.text: Mother: Ha..ha.. if you say so. Wash your hands and come in.

8.text: Sasantha: Mmm…they are very tasty aunty. Thank you very much. Mother: You’re welcome.

9.text: Ram: Now that we’ve had our tea, shall we play a game?

10.text: Sasantha: What do you have in mind?

11.text: Shyam: Usually, when we get together, we play chess, carrom, ludo and we also solve riddles.

13.text: Ram: I have a collection of riddles. Shall we solve them? Mother, will you join us?

14.text: Mother: No son, I can’t. I have to prepare lunch.

16.text: Mother: Well, since we have a guest today, I thought of making puri with potato and dosai with sambar and we have payasam for dessert.

17.text: Ram: Wow! mother, that’s a very good menu. I hope my friend will enjoy it.

18.text: 1. What were the boys doing when mother brought them tea?

19.text: 2. What did they have for tea?

21.text: 4. What are they planning to do after tea?

22.text: 5. What will they have for lunch?

24.text: a). Here are some riddles from Sasantha’s riddle book. Can you

26.text: watermelon / the letter W / in the river bank / fire / your name / a stamp/ an onion / a mushroom / a coffin/ a needle
